items.sentence: I actually heard someone use this expression just this morning.
Last night, I fell asleep while talking with Mary on the phone.
My grandfather goes for walks on days when the weather is good.
Nowadays more and more people prefer country life to city life.
On my way home from school yesterday, I was caught in a shower.
Maybe the two parties will be able to come to an understanding.
Tom didn\'t get his driver\'s license until he was twenty-four.
I programed my first computer game when I was twelve years old.
I wonder how Tom managed to park his car in such a small space.
Mary and I have been acquainted with each other for many years.
Stop beating around the bush and tell us what you really think.
I guess I\'m wasting my time trying to convince Tom to help us.
It\'s unlikely that replacing the battery will fix the problem.
Let\'s go drink a cup of coffee at that coffee shop over there.
I suspect that Tom doesn\'t really enjoy doing that by himself.
I think Tom is the only one here who doesn\'t know how to swim.
If you don\'t want to do it yourself, you can ask Tom to do it.
Of all the countries I\'ve visited, I liked Australia the best.
We spend too much time talking about things that don\'t matter.
We\'ll use the house as collateral so we can borrow some money.
